description.en: litellm is a universal API for all LLMs.
description.zh-CN: litellm 是所有 LLM 的通用 API。

description.en: SiliconFlow is a universal API for all LLMs.
description.zh-CN: SiliconFlow 是所有 LLM 的通用 API。

description.en: Qiniu Cloud AI provides powerful LLM services with high performance and reliability.
description.zh-CN: 7牛云AI 提供高性能、高可靠性的大语言模型服务。

description.en: AiHubMix is a comprehensive AI model aggregation platform providing access to multiple LLMs.
description.zh-CN: AiHubMix 是一个综合性的AI模型聚合平台，提供多种大语言模型的访问服务。

description.en: ocool AI provides high-quality LLM services with multiple regional endpoints for optimal performance.
description.zh-CN: ocool AI 提供高质量的大语言模型服务，支持多个地区端点以获得最佳性能。

description.en: Alibaba Cloud Bailian provides powerful AI models including Qwen series for text generation, embedding, and vision understanding.
description.zh-CN: 阿里云百炼提供强大的AI模型，包括通义千问系列，支持文本生成、向量嵌入和视觉理解。

description.en: DeepSeek provides advanced AI models including DeepSeek-V3 and reasoning models with OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-CN: DeepSeek 提供先进的AI模型，包括DeepSeek-V3和推理模型，兼容OpenAI API。

description.en: OpenRouter provides unified access to 400+ AI models from various providers through a single OpenAI-compatible API, offering model routing, uptime optimization, and competitive pricing.
description.zh-Hans: OpenRouter 通过单一的 OpenAI 兼容 API 提供对来自各种提供商的 400+ AI 模型的统一访问，提供模型路由、正常运行时间优化和有竞争力的价格。

description.en: Hugging Face Inference API provides free serverless inference for thousands of models hosted on the Hub, including text generation, image classification, embeddings, and more.
description.zh-Hans: Hugging Face 推理 API 为托管在 Hub 上的数千个模型提供免费的无服务器推理，包括文本生成、图像分类、嵌入等。

description.en: Replicate lets you run machine learning models with a cloud API. Run and fine-tune models, deploy custom models at scale, all with one line of code. Thousands of community models available.
description.zh-Hans: Replicate 让您通过云端 API 运行机器学习模型。运行和微调模型，大规模部署自定义模型，仅需一行代码。提供数千个社区模型。

description.en: Groq is an AI solutions company delivering ultra-low latency inference with the first ever LPU™ Inference Engine. Groq API enables developers to integrate state-of-the-art LLMs such as Llama-3 into low latency applications.
description.zh-Hans: Groq 是一家AI解决方案公司，通过首个LPU™推理引擎提供超低延迟推理。Groq API使开发者能够将Llama-3等最先进的LLM集成到低延迟应用中。

description.en: Cohere allows developers and enterprises to build LLM-powered applications with world-class models. The Command family of models powers conversational agents, summarization, copywriting, and similar use cases.
description.zh-Hans: Cohere 允许开发者和企业使用世界一流的模型构建 LLM 驱动的应用程序。Command 系列模型为对话代理、摘要、文案写作和类似用例提供支持。

description.en: Mistral AI creates powerful, efficient, and customizable AI models with a strong focus on performance and controlled generation. Mistral models excel at reasoning, knowledge, and coding tasks.
description.zh-Hans: Mistral AI 创建强大、高效且可定制的AI模型，专注于性能和可控生成。Mistral模型在推理、知识和编码任务方面表现出色。

description.en: Perplexity's Sonar provides real-time web search-powered AI responses with citations. It offers lightweight, fast, and affordable AI with advanced research capabilities and multi-step reasoning.
description.zh-Hans: Perplexity 的 Sonar 提供基于实时网络搜索的AI响应，并附带引用。它提供轻量级、快速且经济实惠的AI，具备先进的研究能力和多步骤推理。

description.en: Zhipu AI provides advanced GLM models including GLM-4, GLM-4V for multimodal tasks, and CogView for image generation.
description.zh-CN: 智谱AI 提供先进的GLM模型，包括GLM-4、多模态GLM-4V和图像生成CogView等。

description.en: Anthropic Claude offers highly performant AI models including Claude 4 Opus and Sonnet for advanced reasoning, coding, and analysis.
description.zh-CN: Anthropic Claude 提供高性能AI模型，包括Claude 4 Opus和Sonnet，专长于高级推理、编程和分析。

description.en: Moonshot AI offers Kimi models with long context capabilities, including Moonshot-v1 series for extended conversations and reasoning.
description.zh-CN: Moonshot AI 提供 Kimi 长上下文模型，包括 Moonshot-v1 系列，支持长对话和推理。

description.en: Perplexity Sonar provides real-time web search and Q&A capabilities with access to current information and citations.
description.zh-CN: Perplexity Sonar 提供实时网络搜索和问答功能，可获取最新信息并提供引用。

description.en: Google Gemini provides advanced multimodal AI capabilities including text, image, video, and audio understanding with state-of-the-art reasoning.
description.zh-CN: Google Gemini 提供先进的多模态AI能力，包括文本、图像、视频和音频理解，具备最先进的推理能力。

description.en: DeepSeek is an AI company focused on developing advanced language models including DeepSeek-V3 and DeepSeek-R1 reasoning models with strong capabilities in mathematics, coding, and reasoning.
description.zh-Hans: DeepSeek 是一家专注于开发先进语言模型的AI公司，包括 DeepSeek-V3 和 DeepSeek-R1 推理模型，在数学、编程和推理方面具有强大能力。

description.en: NVIDIA provides enterprise-grade AI APIs including NIM microservices for accelerating foundation model deployment with production-grade runtimes and security updates.
description.zh-Hans: NVIDIA 提供企业级 AI API，包括 NIM 微服务，用于加速基础模型部署，具备生产级运行时和安全更新。

description.en: Hyperbolic provides serverless inference for AI models with ultra-low latency and competitive pricing. Features include text generation, image generation, and audio generation with OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-Hans: Hyperbolic 为 AI 模型提供无服务器推理，具有超低延迟和有竞争力的价格。功能包括文本生成、图像生成和音频生成，具有 OpenAI 兼容的 API。

description.en: Stability AI is a leading AI company focused on generative AI models including Stable Diffusion for image generation, Stable Video for video generation, and other cutting-edge AI technologies.
description.zh-Hans: Stability AI 是一家领先的AI公司，专注于生成式AI模型，包括用于图像生成的 Stable Diffusion、用于视频生成的 Stable Video 和其他前沿AI技术。

description.en: Voyage AI provides cutting-edge embedding models and rerankers for semantic search and retrieval-augmented generation (RAG). State-of-the-art text, multimodal embeddings, and reranking capabilities.
description.zh-Hans: Voyage AI 提供前沿的嵌入模型和重排序器，用于语义搜索和检索增强生成 (RAG)。最先进的文本、多模态嵌入和重排序功能。

description.en: Jina AI provides search foundation APIs including embeddings, rerankers, web readers, search, classification, and segmentation. Best-in-class multimodal and multilingual capabilities for AI applications.
description.zh-Hans: Jina AI 提供搜索基础 API，包括嵌入、重排序、网页阅读器、搜索、分类和分割。为 AI 应用提供一流的多模态和多语言功能。

description.en: Cerebras Inference API offers developers a low-latency solution for AI model inference powered by Cerebras Wafer-Scale Engines and CS-3 systems, achieving world record performance with speeds over 2600 tokens/s.
description.zh-Hans: Cerebras 推理 API 为开发者提供基于 Cerebras 晶圆级引擎和 CS-3 系统的低延迟 AI 模型推理解决方案，实现世界纪录性能，速度超过 2600 tokens/s。

description.en: SambaNova Cloud provides ultra-fast AI inference powered by Reconfigurable Dataflow Units (RDU), delivering up to 10x faster performance than GPUs with support for Llama, DeepSeek, and other leading open-source models.
description.zh-Hans: SambaNova Cloud 提供由可重构数据流单元 (RDU) 驱动的超快 AI 推理，性能比 GPU 快 10 倍，支持 Llama、DeepSeek 和其他领先的开源模型。

description.en: Novita AI is a low-cost, reliable, and simple cloud infrastructure for shipping AI models. Provides scalable, production-ready model inference with affordable GPU cloud infrastructure and OpenAI-compatible API.
description.zh-Hans: Novita AI 是一个低成本、可靠且简单的云基础设施，用于部署 AI 模型。提供可扩展的生产就绪模型推理，具有经济实惠的 GPU 云基础设施和 OpenAI 兼容的 API。

description.en: xAI develops Grok, an AI assistant with real-time knowledge and advanced reasoning capabilities. Grok models excel at understanding context, humor, and providing helpful responses with access to real-time information.
description.zh-Hans: xAI 开发 Grok，一个具有实时知识和高级推理能力的 AI 助手。Grok 模型擅长理解上下文、幽默，并提供有用的响应，可访问实时信息。

description.en: Zhipu AI provides advanced language models including GLM-4, GLM-4V for multimodal capabilities, CharGLM for role-playing, CogVideo for video generation, and comprehensive AI solutions for enterprises and developers.
description.zh-Hans: 智谱AI 提供先进的语言模型，包括 GLM-4、用于多模态功能的 GLM-4V、用于角色扮演的 CharGLM、用于视频生成的 CogVideo，以及为企业和开发者提供的综合 AI 解决方案。

description.en: Moonshot AI provides Kimi, an intelligent assistant with ultra-long context capabilities up to 2 million characters. Offers comprehensive AI solutions including chat completions, file processing, and multimodal understanding.
description.zh-Hans: Moonshot AI 提供 Kimi，一个具有超长上下文能力（最多 200 万字符）的智能助手。提供全面的 AI 解决方案，包括对话完成、文件处理和多模态理解。

description.en: Minimax AI provides advanced AI models including Hailuo video generation, text models with reasoning capabilities, high-quality TTS, and multimodal AI solutions for developers and enterprises.
description.zh-Hans: Minimax AI 提供先进的 AI 模型，包括海螺视频生成、具有推理能力的文本模型、高质量 TTS 和面向开发者和企业的多模态 AI 解决方案。

description.en: Baichuan AI develops Baichuan 2, a series of open-source large language models trained on 2.6 trillion tokens. Offers 7B and 13B Base and Chat versions with state-of-the-art performance on Chinese and English benchmarks.
description.zh-Hans: 百川智能开发 Baichuan 2，一系列基于 2.6 万亿 Token 训练的开源大语言模型。提供 7B 和 13B 的 Base 和 Chat 版本，在中英文基准测试中表现卓越。

description.en: Stepfun AI develops the Step series of foundation models including Step-2 (trillion-parameter MoE language model), Step-1.5V (multimodal model), Step-Video-T2V (video generation), and Step-Audio (speech interaction). Founded in April 2023 with the mission to Scale-up possibilities for everyone.
description.zh-Hans: 阶跃星辰开发 Step 系列基础模型，包括 Step-2（万亿参数 MoE 语言模型）、Step-1.5V（多模态模型）、Step-Video-T2V（视频生成）和 Step-Audio（语音交互）。成立于 2023 年 4 月，使命是为每个人扩展可能性。
